column6:
It's all fun and games when Ben tells a group of schoolchildren a rather fanciful account of a battle against the Rhino, but when the real life Abomination shows up, things turn deadly serious for the Fantastic Four.,2008,2
All Ages...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Tom Grummett | artist:David Hahn | colorist:Lee Loughridge | letterer:Nate Piekos | writer:Paul Tobin
